attributes.action: reinstate  The Royal Tournament  annual  military event to London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Tournament was an annual event which ran for 119 years, until cancelled in 1999. Much loved by the public, this showpiece of military skill and tradition , raised many thousands of pounds for service charities, and was very successful in introducing and recruiting young people into our magnificent armed forces. Please Prime Minister, Bring back The Royal Tournament,

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reinstate The Royal Tournament annual military event to London."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14647.asp

Prime Minister's Office
